basic.floral_language:
Senecio rowleyanus
Floriography: lovely, smooth, kind
Has smooth and fleshy round green leaves, like 'Prayer's beads', has a dark green longitudinal stripe in the middle of a leaf, long stems with many branches, like strings of beads, often used as a hanging plant alone, high ornamental value, 
Likes half shaded environments, need shade properly under scattered light, reduce watering under summer high temperature. Flowers when conditions are right, white or brown flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, white or brown flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, water less frequently under summer high temperature
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
